Up.Statement:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'w2_OrderWorkflowSetting' AND COLUMN_NAME = 'return_action') ALTER TABLE [w2_OrderWorkflowSetting] ADD [return_action] [nvarchar] (2) NOT NULL DEFAULT (N'0'); GO
